story_text: Lucy the lamb loves to leap over little logs in the lush green field.
She laughs loudly as she lands on a soft layer of leaves.
story_images: A fluffy lamb named Lucy is happily leaping over small logs surrounded by a lush green field.
Lucy the lamb is shown laughing joyfully as she lands on a pile of colorful autumn leaves.

questions.question: What does Lucy the lamb love to do?
Where does Lucy land?
choices: On a soft layer of leaves
questions.answer: On a soft layer of leaves
